metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10146 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
Multiple memory leaks in the caption and label handling code in ImageMagickallow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption)via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.5').
